original: tata āvaraṇadevatābhya ekaikāmāhutiṃ datvā ritvigbhiruktaprakāreṇa saṃskṛteṣu pūrvādikuṇḍeṣu krameṇācāryo vahniṃ viharet |
analyzed: tatas āvaraṇa devatābhyaḥ ekaikām āhutim da tvā ritvigbhiḥ ukta prakāreṇa saṃskṛteṣu pūrva ādi kuṇḍeṣu krameṇa ācāryaḥ vahnim viharet

original: tataḥ sarve ṛtvijaḥ svasvakuṇḍāgnau sāvaraṇāmiṣṭadevatāmupacāraiḥ saṃpūjya mūlamantreṇājyena pañcaviṃśatyāhutirhutvā'varaṇadevatābhya ekaikāmāhutiṃ dadyuḥ |
analyzed: tatas sarve ṛtvijaḥ sva sva kuṇḍa agnau sa āvaraṇām iṣṭadevatām upacāraiḥ saṃpūjya mūlamantreṇa ājyena pañcaviṃśati āhutiḥ hutvā āvaraṇa devatābhyaḥ ekaikām āhutim dadyuḥ

original: tato guruḥ pūrvoktacarordvitīyabhāgaṃ navadhā vibhajya bhāgamekaṃ svayaṃ gṛhītvā ekaikaṃ bhāgaṃ sarvebhya ṛtvigbhyo dadyāt |

original: tatastasmi/ścarau ghṛtaṃ nidhāya saghṛtena caruṇā'cārya ṛtvijaśca sve sve kuṇḍe mūlamantreṇa pratyekaṃ pañcaviṃśatyāhutīrjuhuyuḥ |

original: tata āvaraṇadevatābhya ekaikāmāhutiṃ datvā mūlamantreṇājyena daśa daśāhutīrhutvā vahnirūpāmiṣṭadevatāṃ praṇameyuḥ |
analyzed: tatas āvaraṇa devatābhyaḥ ekaikām āhutim da tvā mūlamantreṇa ājyena daśa daśa āhutīḥ hutvā vahni rūpām iṣṭadevatām praṇameyuḥ

original: tata ācāryaścarostṛtīyabhāgaṃ dvidhā vibhajya palāśapatre pippalapatre vā nidhāya bhāgamekaṃ svayaṃ gṛhītvā paraṃ bhāgaṃ śiṣyāya dadyāt |

original: tato dīkṣādine gurvādayaḥ sarve prātarutthāya prātaḥkṛtyasnānasandhyādinityakarma samāpya yāgamaṇḍapaṃ praviśya devatāṃ natvā sve sve kuṇḍe saghṛtaistilaistaddevatākalpoktadravyāntarairvā svāhāntena mūlamantreṇa pratyekamaṣṭottarasahasrāhutīraṣṭottaraśatāhutīrvā juhuyuḥ |
analyzed: tatas dīkṣā dine guru ādayaḥ sarve prātar utthāya prātar kṛtya snāna sandhyā ādi nityakarma samāpya yāga maṇḍapam praviśya devatām natvā sve sve kuṇḍe sa ghṛtaiḥ tilaiḥ tad devatā kalpa ukta dravya antaraiḥ vā svāhā antena mūlamantreṇa pratyekam aṣṭottarasahasra āhutīḥ aṣṭottaraśata āhutīḥ vā juhuyuḥ

original: tato homasamāptau guruḥ samutthāya maṇḍapādbahirgatvā kṛtasnānaṃ śiṣyaṃ pañcagavyaṃ pāyayitvā dakṣiṇadvāreṇa maṇḍapaṃ praveśya svīyaṃ kuṇḍāntikamānayet |

original: tato divyadṛṣṭyā śiṣyaṃ vilokya tadvṛdayādvahannāḍyā'ṅkuśamudrayā taccaitanyamākṛṣya svavahannāḍīmārgeṇa svahṛdaye saṃyojyādhvaśodhanaṃ kuryāt |

śiva śakti sadāśiva īśvara vidyā māyā vidyā kalā rāga kāla niyati puruṣa prakṛti buddhi ahaṅkāra manaḥ cakṣuḥ śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā tvac vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upastha śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandha aka aṃśa vāyu tejaḥ jala pṛthivī ākhyāni ṣaṭtriṃśat gaṇeśa śaiva tattvāni

jīva prāṇa manaḥ buddhi śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandha ākāśa vāyu tejaḥ jala pṛthvī cakṣuḥ śrotra jihvā ghrāṇa tvac vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upastha sūrya soma agni vāsudeva saṃkarṣaṇa pradyumna aniruddha ākhyāni dvātriṃśat vaiṣṇava tattvāni
ākāśa vāyu tejaḥ jala pṛthivī śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandha manaḥ haṅkāra cakṣuḥ śrotra jihvā ghrāṇa tvac vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upastha prakṛti mahat tattva ākhyāni caturviṃśatiḥ saura tattvāni
nivṛtti pratiṣṭhā vidyā śānti śānti atīta ākhya kalā pañcaka vindu kalā nāda śakti sadāśiva ākhyāni daśa prakṛti tattvāni

original: ātmavidyāśivaśivavidyātmasarvākhyāni - traipuratattvāni ca vicintya śiṣyasyopasthapradeśaṃ kūrcena saṃspṛśya-
analyzed: ātma vidyā śiva śiva vidyā ātma sarva ākhyāni traipura tattvāni ca vicintya śiṣyasya upastha pradeśam kūrcena saṃspṛśya
om tattvādhvānam śodhayāmi svāhā iti aṣṭa āhutīḥ juyāt

original: tatastattvādhvānaṃ bhuvanādhvani vilīnaṃ vibhāvya śiṣyasya nābhau krameṇa-

pātāla rasātala mahātala talātala sutala vitala talātala bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar mahar janaḥ tapaḥ satya ākhyāni caturdaśa bhuvanāni vicintya nābhim spṛṣṭvā
om bhuvanādhvānam śodhayāmi svāhā iti aṣṭa āhutīḥ juhuyāt

original: tato bhuvanādhvānaṃ varṇādhvani vilīnaṃ vibhāvya śiṣyasya hṛdaye'kārādikṣakārāntān vicintya hṛdayaṃ spṛṣṭvā-
analyzed: tatas bhuvanādhvānam varṇa adhvani vilīnam vibhāvya śiṣyasya hṛdaya īkāra ādi kṣakāra antān vicintya hṛdayam spṛṣṭvā
om varṇādhvānam śodhayāmi svāhā iti aṣṭa āhutīḥ juhuyāt

original: tato varṇādhvānaṃ padādhvani vilīnaṃ vibhāvya śiṣyasya lalāṭe mantrapadāni vicintya lalāṭaṃ saṃspṛśya-
analyzed: tatas varṇa adhvānam pada adhvani vilīnam vibhāvya śiṣyasya lalāṭe mantra padāni vicintya lalāṭam saṃspṛśya

original: hastaiḥ śūlaṃ kapālaṃ varadamabhayadaṃ cāruhāraṃ bhajāmi |

manu lakṣam japet mantram tad sahasram yathāvidhi
juhuyāt madhura āsiktaiḥ āragbadha samidh varaiḥ
mantra antaram āha
prāsāda ākhyaḥ manuḥ proktaḥ bhajatām sarva siddhi daḥ
ṣaṣ adīrgha yukta bījena ṣaḍaṅga vidhiḥ īritaḥ

īśāna ākhyam tatpuruṣam aghoram tad anantaram
vāmadeva āhvayam sadyam ādyam bījam kramāt viduḥ
atha dhyānam
tatas samāhitaḥ bhūtvā dhyāyet devam sadāśivam
muktā pīta payoda mauktika japā varṇaiḥ mukhaiḥ pañcabhiḥ
strī akṣaiḥ añcitam īśam indu mukuṭam pūrṇa indu koṭi prabham
śūlam ṭaṅka kṛpāṇa vajra dahanān nāga indra ghaṇṭā aṅkuśān
pāśam bhīti haram dadhānam amitā kalpa ujjvalam cintayet
atha puraścaraṇam
evam dhyātvā japet mantram pañca lakṣam madhu plutaiḥ
prasūnaiḥ karavīra utthaiḥ juhuyāt tad daśa aṃśakam
mantra antaram āha
tāraḥ māyā viyat vindu manu svara samanvitam
pañca akṣara samāyuktaḥ vasuvarṇaḥ manuḥ mataḥ
pañcākṣara ukta vat kuryāt aṅganyāsa ādikam budhaḥ
dhyānam
vande sindūra varṇam maṇi mukuṭa lasat cāru candra avataṃsam
bhāla udyat netram īśam smita mukha kamalam divya bhūṣā aṅgarāgam
vāma ūru nyasta pāṇeḥ taruṇa kuvalayam saṃdadhatyā priyāyā
vṛtta uttuṅga stana agre nihita kara talam veda ṭaṅka iṣṭa hastam
atha puraścaraṇm
aṣṭa lakṣam japet evam manum veda vidām varaḥ
tad sahasram prajuhuyāt pāyasa annaiḥ ghṛta plutaiḥ
atha mṛtyuñjaya mantraḥ tatra eva
tāram sthirā sa karṇa induḥ bhṛguḥ sarga vibhūṣitaḥ
akṣara ātmā nigaditaḥ manuḥ mṛtyuñjaya ātmakaḥ
ṛṣiḥ kaholaḥ devī ādiḥ gāyatrī chandaḥ īritam
mṛtyuṃjayaḥ mahādevaḥ devatā asya samīritaḥ
bhṛguṇā dīrgha yuktena ṣaṣ aṅgāni samācaret
atha dhyānam
mudrā pāśa mṛga akṣa sūtra vilasat pāṇim himāṃśu prabham
koṭira indu galat sudhā pluta tanum hāra ādi bhūṣā ujjvalam
kāntyā viśva manoharam paśupatim mṛtyuñjayam bhāvayet  /
atha puraścaraṇam
guṇa lakṣam japet mantram tad daśa aṃśam viśāla dhīḥ
juhuyāt amṛtā khaṇḍaiḥ śuddha dugdha ājya lolitaiḥ
atha dakṣiṇāmūrti mantraḥ tatra eva
atha vakṣye mantra ratnam
avāpūryena japtena divyam jñānam muni īśvarāḥ
dakṣiṇāmūrttaye pūrvam tubhyam padam anantaram
vaṭa mūla padasya ante padam paścāt nivāsine
dhyāna eka nirata aṅgāya paścāt brūyāt namaḥ padam
rudrāya śambhave tāra śakti ruddhaḥ ayam īritaḥ
ṣaṭtriṃśat akṣaraḥ mantraḥ sarva kāma phala pradaḥ
muniḥ śukaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ chandaḥ nuṣṭubh samīritam
dakṣiṇāmūrti nāmā asya devatā śambhuḥ īritaḥ
ṣaḍbhiḥ varṇaiḥ hṛdā ākhyātam dvābhyām śiraḥ udīritam
śikhā aṣṭabhiḥ samādiṣṭā vasu arṇaiḥ kavacam matam
pañcabhiḥ netram ākhyātam tribhiḥ astram udāhṛtam
ṣaṭ ete tāra śakti ādyāḥ tāra ādi antāḥ sajātayaḥ
aṅgamantrāḥ samuddiṣṭāḥ yathāvat deśika uttamaiḥ
atha dhyānam
hemācala taṭe ramye siddha kinnara sevite
vividha druma śākhābhiḥ sarvatas vārita ātape  /
su puṣpitaiḥ latā jālaiḥ āśliṣṭa kusuma drume
śilā vivara nirgacchat nirjhara anila śītale  /
gāyat bhṛṅga aṅganā saṅghe nṛtyat varhi kadambake
kūjat kokila saṅghena mukharīkṛta diṅmukhe
paraspara vinirmukta mātsarya mṛga sevite
ādyaiḥ śuka ādyaiḥ munibhiḥ ajasram samupasthite
purandara mukhaiḥ devaiḥ sevā āyātaiḥ vilokitam
vaṭa vṛkṣam mahā ucchrāyam padmarāga phala ujjvalam
gārutmata mayaiḥ patraiḥ nibiḍaiḥ upaśobhitam
nava ratna maya ākalpaiḥ lambamānaiḥ alaṅkṛtam
jala jaiḥ sthala jaiḥ puṣpaiḥ āmodibhiḥ alaṅkṛtam
śṛṇvadbhiḥ veda śāstrāṇi śuka vṛndaiḥ niṣevitam
saṃsāra tāpa viccheda kuśala sthalam adbhutam
vicintya tasya mūla sthe satna siṃhāsane śubhe  /
āsīnam amita akalpam śarad candra nibha ānanam
stūyamānam muni gaṇaiḥ divya jñāna abhilāṣibhiḥ
saṃsmaret jagatām ādyam dakṣiṇāmūrttim avyayam

ayutam madhunā siktaiḥ juhuyāt tila taṇḍulaiḥ
